boardgame.name: Saint Malo
boardgame.description: Developer Stefan Br_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;uuml;ck at alea describes Saint Malo as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;a light, dice-rolling strategy game in which the players draw their own city buildings, walls, and people on wipe-off boards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In more detail, in Saint Malo players roll five dice to gain various resources; combinations of dice create enhancements like characters or buildings, which can provide additional victory points, money, or special actions, such as altering the outcome of a die roll. Players draw symbols for their holdings on erasable boards showing a grids of their cities to create individual towns. Players could build storehouses on particular squares, for example, then place a merchant nearby to gain money each turn. Another important character is the soldier; players must acquire these to defend themselves from pirate attacks that can decimate their towns._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Saint Malo rates a 2 out of 10 on Alea's difficulty scale._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 31: Witches of the Revolution, Welcome to Centerville, Saint Malo, Burgle Bros., Pandemic: The Cure
Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 338 - Dominare, Spectaculum, and Saint Malo
Programa 011. Haritz Solana, de Asmodee. Saint Malo y Smash Up!
There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s No Such Thing as a Cool Cup

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Saint Malo Multilingual first edition Publisher: alea
MINT!

I sell Saint Malo from Alea. Game is in excellent condition, only played once. If you choose to pay via paypal the fees are on your side. Other payment possibility is via bank transfer (IBAN). I am a private seller, so there will be no guarantee.
Copy was damaged in shipment. One corner of the box is pretty dented. Holds the game fine. Played twice, components in appropriate condition for that number of plays. No markers have dried out.

Played once. Only two of the player boards have been used. Everything is in great condition. Boards and instructions have English on them. If you have any questions, let me know. I usually ship USPS priority mail so if you want something different, let me know. Thank you.
shipping rates: Germany = 5 Euro EU countries = 9 Euro worldwide = 9 Euro game weight: 780 gramms
Mint in original shrink. Includes English rules. Shipping weight is 2+lb; shipping will be by USPS Priority Mail. Max of $10.85 for flat rate.

One corner of box is crumpled. Contents are in excellent/undamaged condition. Shipping is via USPS Medium Flat Rate Priority Mail. Insurance is optional and buyer pays. I combine shipping if you purchase multiple items. Please PM me with questions or for photos of the item, and thanks for your interest.
Already sold at auction to Doug E.

Ravensburger (RVB80503) Can you build the most prosperous city and keep it safe from pirates? Roll the dice and then strategically choose what to draw on your erasable game board. Will it be a market place or houses; a nobleman or a solder? Easy to learn and fun to play combination of strategy and luck of the dice.
2-5 players (Ravensburger) Languages: English, Français, Deutsch
